channel.description: Recent content in todo on Clean-Ink

item.title: Primer: Post 9
item.description: You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more. The First Step: Triage Whether you’re just starting your day, or you’re in the middle of the chaos and just need to find some sanity … the first step is to get into triage mode.

item.title: Primer: Basic Formato
item.description: You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more. It all keeps piling up, and it can feel overwhelming. How do you keep up with it all? How do you find focus and peace and get stuff accomplished when you have too much on your plate?

item.title: Primer: When You Have Too Much to Do
item.description: You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more. It all keeps piling up, and it can feel overwhelming. How do you keep up with it all? How do you find focus and peace and get stuff accomplished when you have too much on your plate?
